DOC.brief_summary: Purpose is to compare the frequency of events (presence of Disseminated Tumour Cells, clinical recurrence and/or death) after 1 and 2 years of adjuvant treatment with anastrozole and fulvestrant or anastrozole alone in patients with early breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Anastrozole and Fulvestrant Compared to Anastrozole as Adjuvant Treatment of Postmenopausal Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women with hormone receptorpositive early breast cancer and a positive Disseminated Tumour Cell immunocytochemical result from bone marrow aspiration prior to randomisation Inflammatory and/or metastatic breast cancer. Current or previous malignancy within previous 5 years (other than Breast cancer or adequately treated nonmelanoma skin cancer or insitu cervical cancer). History of bleeding diathesis.
